mdRecord.dcterms:title: End View - Butlers House, Dining Room [Kitchen] & House
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gardner, Alexander, 1821-1882
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of Mansion from the south lawn - the porch and balustrade are missing. View includes the smokehouse, circle storehouse [Butler's House], dairy, kitchen (during this time used as a dining room for visitors), and south colonnade. A handwritten caption on the front border reads: 'End view Butlers House, Dining Room & House.' The following text is printed on the reverse of the cardboard mount: From Gardner's Gallery, 921 Penna. Ave. Washington, D. C. Several handwritten notes on the reverse: 'Josephine E. Andrews' and 'Presented to M. V. L. A. by Mrs. Anna A. Andrews, 44 Linden Park, Buffalo, N. Y., May 1933.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion exterior
p Kitchen
